definition: sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article
flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]
length (of a piece of writing)/space occupied on a printed page
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
thousand articles, same rule (idiom); stereotyped and repetitive/once you've seen one, you've seen them all
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
(of a piece of writing) long and tedious (idiom)/verbose
Lao San Pian, three short essays written by Mao Zedong before the PRC was established
a bunch of nonsense/verbose and rambling

sentences.english: Geomantic avoid learning appropriate piece in emphasize glancing particularly for big fierce, say to glance evil spirit.
sentences.chinese: 风水学宜忌篇中非凡强调反光为大凶，称反光煞。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重复文献，纳入22篇用于综述。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重复文献，纳入22篇用于综述。

sentences.english: He should have no problem writing that essay.
sentences.chinese: 他写那篇论文决无问题。

sentences.english: Psalm 25 is a cry to God for pardon of great sin.
sentences.chinese: 诗篇廿五篇是向神呼求赦免大罪的祷告。

sentences.english: The editor hacked the story to bits.
sentences.chinese: 编辑把那篇小说改得面目全非。

sentences.english: I hear him chuckling to himself as he read that funny article.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他一策念那篇有趣的文致一边柔氢地笑。

sentences.english: I have put the first two verses of Psalm 39 on the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 在我们今天发放的传单上，前两节来自诗篇39篇。

sentences.english: The main content of this course includes two chapters: the introduction and the sensor.
sentences.chinese: 课程的主要内容包括总论篇和传感器篇。

sentences.english: The main content of this course includes two chapters: the introduction and the sensor.
sentences.chinese: 课程的主要内容包括总论篇和传感器篇。

sentences.english: Happy every day, and have a wonderful future!
sentences.chinese: 阅读过我呢篇野嘎人祝你开开心心过每一日。

sentences.english: This book contains 12 stories, including 6 English stories.
sentences.chinese: 这本书包含12篇故事，其中包括6篇英语故事。

sentences.english: This book contains 12 stories, including 6 English stories.
sentences.chinese: 这本书包含12篇故事，其中包括6篇英语故事。

sentences.english: I have a diary for my homework. Nothing to write about.
sentences.chinese: 今天作业有篇日记，但没什么可写的。

sentences.english: Last week I have browse 17 papers total and classify them.
sentences.chinese: 前一周总共看了17篇论文，把它们归了一下类。

definition: start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
